translation.en: I need to talk with the Israeli Prime Minister.
[man] Thank you for coming this late.
This is George Seif, Radio Damascus.
A few minutes ago, our beloved president,
translation.ko: 몇 분 전 아민 알하페즈 대통령께서

translation.en: Amin Al-Hafez, asked me to read this announcement.
you do not remember your name?
You do not know who you are.
I love you more than anything in the whole world.
translation.ko: 난 자기를 이 세상 그 무엇보다 사랑해

translation.en: But if you come home late tonight, I will kill you. Nadia.
translation.ko: 하지만 오늘 밤늦게 오면 죽여버릴 거야, 나디아 씀

translation.en: [Eli] That is none of your business.
Nothing is too expensive for you, mon amour.
translation.ko: 자기한테 과분한 건 없어, 내 사랑

translation.en: Now hurry up if you don't want to be late.
It was so cheap. It was half...
lies in an area claimed by both nations.
Israel used tanks, mortars and aircraft
-We don't have to go. -Syrian officials claim 70 Israelis killed
translation.ko: - 안 가도 돼 - 시리아의 관료는 - 이스라엘인 70명이 사망했고... - 아니, 괜찮아

translation.en: reportedly showing the dogfight in the sky...
And the kids. I mean the kids.
Did they say how many casualties?
-Hi. -I've been looking for you all night.
I'm here with Nadia. You remember her?
You know my wife is absolutely infatuated with you, right?
translation.ko: 우리 아내가 나디아한테 푹 빠진 거 알아요?

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -I mean, come on.
Could you get us a tonic water with a lemon twist, please?
translation.ko: 레몬 조각 넣은 토닉 워터 한 잔 가져다줄래요?
- 조끼를 입고 온 제 탓이죠 - 아뇨

translation.en: I'm fine, and to prove it,
I'm going to get us all a round of tonic water.
I care so much about the kids."
They were nice to invite us.
Well, they invited us to add color to their party, Nadia. That's it.
translation.ko: 파티에 색깔을 더하려고 초대했을 뿐이야, 나디아

translation.en: That's not true. She invited us because she likes me.
translation.ko: 그렇지 않아 날 좋아해서 초대한 거야

translation.en: She's your friend? You fix her dresses.
You're her employee. That's all. You're her maid.
I didn't mean she's not your friend or she doesn't like you.
translation.ko: 그 여자가 친구가 아니라거나 자기를 안 좋아한단 뜻이 아니야

translation.en: -You think that because they have money-- -No, no.
It's because they think they're better than us.
With their stupid parties and their childish music.
translation.ko: 바보 같은 파티를 벌이고 유치한 음악이나 틀고

translation.en: They have no idea what I did in Egypt.
They think I'm just another immigrant.
How would they know if you don't tell them?
You sit quietly in the corner and expect everyone to guess.
translation.ko: 구석에 조용히 앉아서 남들이 알아봐 주길 바라잖아

translation.en: You know what they see when they look at me?
translation.ko: 그 사람들이 날 뭐로 보는 줄 알아?

translation.en: Can you do me a favor?
Can you get me some tonic water with a lemon twist?
translation.ko: 레몬 조각 넣은 토닉 워터 한 잔 가져다줘

translation.en: [man] I'm sick and tired of burying my sons and daughters...
translation.ko: 우리 아들과 딸들을 얼마나 더 묻어야 하냐?

translation.en: -There has to be a solution... -I quit.
...and I want to know what it is.
And if you can't give me the right answers,
I'll fetch someone who'll give them to me.
Jacob, this can't continue like this.
translation.ko: 야코브, 이런 일이 계속 벌어져선 안 돼!

translation.en: We need to send someone there as soon as possible.
-It doesn't work that way. -Then make it work that way.
translation.ko: - 그런 식으론 안 돼요 - 그런 식으로 되게 해

translation.en: We have no one in there to tell us what's going on.
I understand, but what you're talking about takes time.
translation.ko: 상황은 압니다만 그 일엔 시간이 걸려요

translation.en: To build a reliable cover, train...
translation.ko: 믿을 만한 위장 신분을 만들고 훈련하려면...

translation.en: Uh... We're talking at least two years.
You have six months, not a day more.
You wanna go in there and tell him that right now?
I'll walk with you. Come on.
Let me know the moment you identify an asset.
We've made this mistake once before.
Come with me. I want to show you something.
I'm not supposed to show it to you.
In the past five months, there were four attacks
from the Syrian Golan on our villages.
-The attacks are escalating. -I know all this.
translation.ko: - 공격이 증가하고 있어요 - 그건 나도 아네

translation.en: These aerial images we got from our American friends
translation.ko: 이 항공 사진들은 미국 친구들한테 받은 건데

translation.en: from where the Syrians are shooting.
these were taken one hour before...
and after the most recent attack.
translation.ko: 한 시간 전과 후에 찍은 겁니다

translation.en: We think underground, but we're not sure.
The Syrians are trying to make us look the other way.
translation.ko: 우리가 다른 곳을 보게 하려는 겁니다

translation.en: Why? What are they up to?
We have no idea what they're building,
translation.ko: 우리도 그들이 뭘 짓고 있는진 몰라

translation.en: but I can assure you we're not going to like it.
translation.ko: 하지만 하나는 확실하지 그게 우리한테 득이 되진 않을 걸세

translation.en: The Golan is one of the most guarded places in the world.
translation.ko: 골란고원은 세계에서 가장 경비가 삼엄한 곳이야

translation.en: The Syrians don't let anyone in there.
translation.ko: 시리아인들은 그곳에 누구도 못 들어오게 하지

translation.en: We need eyes and ears on the other side of the border.
translation.ko: 우린 국경 너머에 눈과 귀가 필요하네

translation.en: We owe our people the right to live in peace and security.
translation.ko: 우린 우리 국민의 평화와 안전을 지켜야 해

translation.en: In this land, that right doesn't come without a price.
translation.ko: 이 땅에서 그건 대가가 따르는 일이야

translation.en: And sometimes the price is high, as you very well know.
translation.ko: 대가가 비쌀 때도 있지 자네도 알잖나

translation.en: Look, at least before you say no to me,
consider all the people we are responsible for.
translation.ko: 우리가 지켜야 할 모든 사람을 생각해봐

translation.en: immigrated to Israel three years ago.
-And we disqualified him because... -We don't like volunteers. Too eager.
translation.ko: - 불합격한 이유는... - 우린 자원자를 싫어하잖아요 의욕이 넘쳤어요

translation.en: And also because of his brother,
Oh, he smuggled Jews from Egypt to Israel.
He joined them only years after. He stayed to help.
translation.ko: 몇 년 후 합류했고 계속 남아서 도왔어요

translation.en: arrested in connection with the Lavon Affair.
So he's got a record in Egypt.
Do you want me to send everyone home?
I thought we stopped doing that.
Desperate times call for desperate measures.
I'm sorry I'm calling this late,
but I tried a few times.
Explain the significance of this again.
I can teach anyone to transmit,
to make a bomb, to go undercover.
But a true agent has instinct,
He either has it or he doesn't.
So you gave him the wrong address.
An operative should sense that something is wrong,
But there must be dozens of other windows facing him.
translation.ko: 저쪽을 향한 창문이 수십 개는 있을 텐데

translation.en: And even if he knows this is a test,
how could he possibly know that...
Do you know who we are?
If I'm right, I applied to you twice before.
translation.ko: 제 짐작이 맞다면 제가 두 번 지원한 곳이죠

translation.en: We want to offer you the opportunity to do something important with your life.
translation.ko: 자네의 인생을 바쳐 중대한 일을 할 기회를 주겠네

translation.en: Do you consider yourself a patriot?
I love this country with all my might.
translation.ko: 전 이 나라를 온 마음으로 사랑합니다

translation.en: If your country needed you to quit your job,
If your country needed you to quit your job,
If your country needed you to lie to your friends, your family,
If your country asked you to risk your life,
Nothing about this conversation is hypothetical.
Tomorrow morning, you will get up,
and come here without telling anyone.
translation.ko: 이곳으로 와야 해 모두에게 비밀로 하고

translation.en: You'll begin working with me and my team.
translation.ko: 자넨 내 팀에서 나와 함께 일할 거야

translation.en: In the next few days, you'll go through a series of tests,
translation.ko: 며칠 동안 일련의 시험을 치르게 될 거고

translation.en: you'll go through a period of training.
translation.ko: 일정 기간 훈련을 받게 될 걸세

translation.en: If, after that, you're found to be a good fit for us,
translation.ko: 그 후 우리 일에 적합하다고 판단되면

translation.en: I'd like to kill this machine. Before it kills me.
translation.ko: 이 기계 박살 내버릴까 봐 찔려 죽기 전에

translation.en: Really, I have to finish this dress.
Two of my agents are following us right now.
translation.ko: 내 요원 둘이 우리를 미행하고 있다

translation.en: They've been following us for a while.
I want you to spot them before we get to that juice bar.
translation.ko: 누구인지 알아내 저 주스 가게에 도착하기 전에

translation.en: Don't let them see you know,
that way you have an advantage.
and check the reflections whenever you can.
translation.ko: 가능한 한 자주 반사되는 상을 확인해

translation.en: Combines a high-velocity cannon with exceptional long-range endurance.
translation.ko: 고속 대포가 장착됐고 장거리 내구력이 뛰어나죠

translation.en: This model has an entirely new, thinner,
translation.ko: 이 모델은 새롭게 설계된 더 얇고 높게 펼쳐진 날개와

translation.en: and more highly swept wing and tail plane
Our goal is 25 words a minute.
Co-- I-- I mean, Colonel Afif Al-Bizri.
The man in the brown shirt and short sleeves.
Ahmed Suidani, head of secret police.
The man with the green cap,
and the older woman by the vegetable stand.
There's no room for mistake, Eli.
He spotted the both of you.
I'm looking for my husband, Eli Cohen.
He needs to head up from the north.
-From the south or the north? -I couldn't spot it.
Everything is moving according to plan.
We need to move him faster into Buenos Aires.
-It's the perfect time to get in. -I can't agree to that.
Last I checked, you work for me.
His cover is not yet secured.
Cover is never perfect. People are dying while we wait.
translation.ko: 위장은 완벽할 수 없어 망설일 동안 사람들이 죽고 있다고

translation.en: He's of no use in Damascus if he's not secure.
-Think of the risk of sending him. -The Prime Minister spent his morning
translation.ko: 발각될 위험을... 총리께선 오늘 아침 두 아이를 잃은 어머니를

translation.en: consoling a mother who lost two of her children.
translation.ko: 총리께선 오늘 아침 두 아이를 잃은 어머니를 위로하고 오셨네

translation.en: A nine year-old girl who lost both her parents and both her legs.
A Swedish volunteer who lost her eyesight
because she came to this country to help pick tomatoes.
Are you working on your cover?
-I thought you were done for the day? -I am.
They seem to have a revolution every two months.
We like to joke that the leader is the first Syrian officer
translation.ko: 아침 라디오 방송에 제일 먼저 출연해서

translation.en: to get to the radio in the morning,
Tomorrow I'm scheduled to hand in your report to Jacob.
translation.ko: 내일, 자네에 관한 보고서를 야코브한테 제출할 예정이야

translation.en: It says you passed all the exams,
and that you're ready to be operational.
Thank you. Don't thank me yet.
You have 24 hours to think about it.
And I want you to really take your time
If you come back and say yes, I'll hand in the report
But if you say you've decided you don't want to pursue this,
translation.ko: 하지만 자네가 이 일을 하기 싫다고 한다면

translation.en: Say that you've been found an unlikely candidate.
You want me to say no?
I want you to know you're not obligated to do this.
translation.ko: 이건 자네의 의무가 아니란 점을 알길 바라네

translation.en: It's a bit late for that.
Your mother told me once that when a man brings his wife flowers,
translation.ko: 어머님이 그러셨어 남편이 꽃을 들고 오면

translation.en: [laughs] That sounds exactly like my mother.
-Who are you cheating on me with? -What...
I went to the store today to visit you.
They told me you haven't worked there for months.
I just wanted to make sure that they offered me the job
To be... What is it again?
I'll be traveling all around the world...
Eli, if this is about money, I can get another job.
translation.ko: 엘리, 돈 때문에 그러는 거면 내가 다른 일을 구할게

translation.en: No, I will not have my wife work two jobs.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 내 아내가 투잡을 뛰게 할 순 없지

translation.en: for me to give you the life that I promised you, Nadi.
translation.ko: 자기에게 약속했던 행복한 삶을 살게 해줄게

translation.en: Will you be gone for a long period of time?
If I prove myself over the next few years,
who knows, they might even make me an ambassador,
and that means that you will be Mrs. Ambassador Cohen.
translation.ko: 그러면 자기는 코헨 대사 부인이 되겠지

translation.en: So why did you go to visit my old work?
I just happened to be nearby.
It's stupid. My wife and I, we...
We write each other letters and we leave them in silly places.
translation.ko: 편지를 써서 엉뚱한 곳에 숨겨두곤 해요

translation.en: Read it and give it to me.
Eli, I love you more than anything in the whole wide world,
translation.ko: 엘리, 난 자기를 이 세상 그 무엇보다 사랑해

translation.en: She said she loves my mustache.
He's arrived. He's getting debriefed as we speak.
So I guess Mrs. Burek is uninterested in my bribes?
translation.ko: 부레크 부인이 내 뇌물에 관심이 없었나 보군

translation.en: What happened to him was not your fault.
translation.ko: 그 사람 일은 당신 책임이 아니에요

translation.en: You know, the first time I saw Mrs. Burek
translation.ko: 내가 부레크 부인을 처음 만난 건

translation.en: was when I delivered the bad news.
I didn't know what she looked like.
It's way above my pay grade,
and maybe I shouldn't even ask this question, but...
translation.ko: 해선 안 될 질문일지 모르지만 만약...

translation.en: aren't we risking him being exposed to more people than he should be?
translation.ko: 지나치게 많은 사람이 엘리를 알게 되면 어쩌죠?

translation.en: Argentina is the most important Arab expat center.
translation.ko: 아르헨티나는 해외에 사는 아랍인들의 가장 큰 중심지지

translation.en: It's the ideal place for Eli
to create relationships within the Arab community
translation.ko: 아랍인 공동체 내에서 관계를 형성하기에 가장 이상적인 장소라고

translation.en: My name is Kamel Amin Thaabeth.
I was named after my father,
My mother's name is Sa'ida Abrahim.
They were both born in Damascus,
but moved to Beirut looking for work.
That is where I was born...
my parents moved to Buenos Aires...
where my father owned a very big textile factory
That is where I live now.
[in Arabic] May he rest in peace...
[in English] ...I took over the business, and, I'm proud to say,
translation.ko: 제가 사업을 물려받았는데 현재 우리는 자랑스럽게도

translation.en: it became one of the most prominent textile companies in South America.
translation.ko: 남미에서 손에 꼽히는 직물 회사가 됐습니다

translation.en: [in Arabic] May she rest in peace...
I do not have any brothers or sisters.
I had an older sister, but...
she passed away when I was three years old.
I've never been to Damascus myself.
translation.ko: 전 다마스쿠스에 한 번도 못 가봤어요

translation.en: I fell in love with it through the stories my father told me.
translation.ko: 아버지께 들은 이야기를 통해 그 도시와 사랑에 빠졌습니다

translation.en: I am the biggest patriot of my beloved country.
translation.ko: 전 누구보다 조국을 사랑하는 진정한 애국자입니다

translation.en: I feel it is now time...
to contribute in whatever way I can.
I believe that I can make a difference.
[Rabbi Endebbo] We don't have much time. Please.
